content: as a belated tribute to ice cream day i m opening my first free pattern with it you can make your own ice creams to sell and/or give as gifts **note ** the sale of this pattern in whole or in part original or adapted is prohibited i ask that if you want to share it with someone or post the photos of your little ice cream don t forget to credit my new craft amigurumis so in addition to sharing your own work you also share mine and help me keep doing what i love the most now without further ado let s crochet **materials** - yarn for amigurumi in beige for the shell and pink for the ice cream - crochet hook compatible with the chosen yarn - brown thread to embroider the granules - mini red pompom for the cherry - needle to embroider the granules - glue for crafts - silicone fiber or other filling of your choice - scissors **my ice cream was crocheted with circle amigurumi yarns and 2mm needle and its final size is 7 5 cm **
